Package assemAssist

Class Catalog

java.lang.Object
assemAssist.Catalog
public class Catalog extends Object
Class representing a catalog of the products offered by the car manufacturing company.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Catalog()
    A constructor that initializes the catalog with the car models specified in the assignment.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addModel(CarModelSpecification model)
    Adds the given car model to the set of car models in the catalog.
    void
    clearCatalog()
    Clears the catalog of all available car models.
    HashSet<String>
    getAvailableModelNames()
    Returns a set of car model names currently offered by the car manufacturing company.
    HashSet<CarModelSpecification>
    getAvailableModels()
    Returns a copy of the set of the CarModelSpecifications offered by the car manufacturing company.
    CarModelSpecification
    getModel(String modelName)
    Returns the car model with the given name.
    TreeMap<String,HashSet<String>>
    getOptions(String modelName)
    Returns a Map of components and their corresponding options for the given car model name.
    int
    getWorkingMinutesWorkstation(String modelName)
    Returns the standard task time for the given car model.

    • Catalog

      public Catalog()
      A constructor that initializes the catalog with the car models specified in the assignment.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableModels

      public HashSet<CarModelSpecification> getAvailableModels()
      Returns a copy of the set of the CarModelSpecifications offered by the car manufacturing company.
      Returns:
      The available car model specifications in the catalog.

    • getAvailableModelNames

      public HashSet<String> getAvailableModelNames()
      Returns a set of car model names currently offered by the car manufacturing company.
      Returns:
      A set of car model names currently offered by the car manufacturing company.

    • getModel

      public CarModelSpecification getModel(String modelName) throws IllegalModelException
      Returns the car model with the given name.
      Parameters:
      modelName - The name of the car model.
      Returns:
      The car model with the given name.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given modelName is null or empty or only contains whitespace.
      IllegalModelException - if the given modelName is not available in the catalog.

    • getOptions

      public TreeMap<String,HashSet<String>> getOptions(String modelName) throws IllegalModelException
      Returns a Map of components and their corresponding options for the given car model name.
      Parameters:
      modelName - The name of the car model.
      Returns:
      A Map of components and their corresponding options for the given car model name.
      Throws:
      IllegalModelException

    • addModel

      public void addModel(CarModelSpecification model)
      Adds the given car model to the set of car models in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      model - The name of new car model. The name of the car model must be unique.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given model is null

    • getWorkingMinutesWorkstation

      public int getWorkingMinutesWorkstation(String modelName) throws IllegalModelException
      Returns the standard task time for the given car model.
      Parameters:
      modelName - The name of the car model.
      Returns:
      The standard task time for the given car model.
      Throws:
      IllegalModelException

    • clearCatalog

      public void clearCatalog()
      Clears the catalog of all available car models.
